price: Perhaps you will grieve yourself to death [O Prophet] over them[5] if they do not believe in this message[6].
arabic: فَلَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ عَلَىٰٓ ءَاثَٰرِهِمۡ إِن لَّمۡ يُؤۡمِنُواْ بِهَٰذَا ٱلۡحَدِيثِ أَسَفًا
footnotes:
[5] To the extent of almost wasting yourself away.
 [6] i.e., the Qur’an.
